creditline: Gift of Kenneth and Sally Leafman Appelbaum
description: spherical base with 3 horses' heads and forequarters as feet; central openwork area with stylized Hebrew letters (?); half-spherical cup at top; top and bottom appear to separate, but are currently fused together
markings: at interior of cup, in relief: [(lion w/ sack lettered \"ME\")/ Michael/ Ende/ Jerusalem Israel]; on bottom, incised: [Michael/ Ende/ Jerusalem/ Israel/ S-925/ AP2]
title: Wine cup
